metadata.title: CVE-2010-1195 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the htmlscrubber component inikiwiki 2.x before 2.53.5 and 3.x before 3.20100312 allows remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted data:image/svg+xmlURI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-1195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20130904.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20130904.1ubuntu1').
